item.description:
This place was suggested by Prem, I have been there and liked it enough that I was going to do it anyway. I know it's short notice, but maybe a few of you can join me. A nice atmosphere, fresh ingredients done well if a little differently than "standard" thai. Your standard favorites may not be exactly what you expect as the spices and are a little different but it's always quite good! Here is a website for YELP that has reviews http://www.yelp.com/b...

Some Ethnic Dining "Rules":

1) If you RSVP "YES" you are expected to SHOW UP!!! Be polite and make sure you change your RSVP by 1:00pm THE DAY BEFORE if need be. If you have to cancel or want to add yourself at the last minute call the restaurant to let them know

2) Please bring cash, it is so much quicker and easier. Remember, no one leaves until the bill is paid - this is respect for the event's host and the other diners.

3) I will collect $1.00 from each participant for Meetup fees.

4) This is a great group, we have a wonderful time at these events so let's keep the Organizer happy - come make me smile!

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Thai Palace 03/24/10 7:00pm
